string.text:
A high-performance optical scope designed for the VKS rifle, offering enhanced long-range precision and target acquisition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Various
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_2]1.0x - 8.0x
